## ğŸ“¦ Installation

### Using Go Install
```bash
go install github.com/k0ns0l/driftwatch@{TAG}
```

### Using Homebrew (macOS/Linux)
```bash

```

### Using Docker
```bash

# or
docker pull ghcr.io/k0ns0l/driftwatch:{TAG}
```

Download the appropriate binary for your platform from the [releases page](https://github.com/k0ns0l/driftwatch/releases/tag/{TAG}).
